name: WotD
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Flash briefing for Anu Gary's "A Word A Day" daily newsletter. Create a custom HTML to XML service for parsing, preserving the Quote of the Day (especially); long-term: does Alexa follow IPA pronunciations (or with a mapping, could be made to suffice)?

This skill was built with love by VoiceApps.com. Visit us to create your own skill in minutes!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
